nodes.text: A pike was a type of polearm used in various cultures. Geonosian picadors used static pikes to control deadly creatures for Petranaki gladiatorial battles. Imperial sandtroopers who rode spamels on Jedha and dewbacks on Tatooine also carried pikes.
The Jedi Temple Guards used special lightsabers that featured two rare yellow plasma blades on each side of the staff, which were called lightsaber pikes.
The Royal Guards also utilized these weapons. A trio of the Emperor's Royal Guards used modified magnetic force pikes to subdue Ezra Bridger when he failed to obey the Emperor as an apprentice.
